text_run.content: The Zilliz Cloud Bring Your Own Cloud (BYOC) solution allows you to create and run a Zilliz Cloud cluster within your own cloud infrastructure. This enhances data security, reduces data breach risks, and improves performance and scalability. This guide will help you through the BYOC license activation process.

resources to the Zilliz Cloud BYOC license. ARNs uniquely identify AWS resources, providing a reference that allows Zilliz Cloud to securely access and manage these resources during activation. This step is critical to ensure a seamless integration between your AWS environment and the Zilliz Cloud platform.

: The credentials required to run your project. Enter the access key and secret key you created in the

and Zilliz Cloud. For more information about external IDs, refer to

Initialize the Terraform configuration. This step prepares Terraform to manage

Preview resource creation. Terraform lists all IAM policies and roles required for BYOC activation. For details, refer to
Apply the configuration to create resources. This will generate a

in order to authorize Terraform to carry out the required actions.
After Terraform execution, carefully record the ARNs from the command output. These ARNs are important for the

aws_lb_irsa_policy_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:policy/zilliz/zilliz-aws-lb-irsa-policy"
bootstrap_role_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/zilliz/zilliz-bootstrap-role"
cluster_autoscaler_irsa_policy_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:policy/zilliz/zilliz-ca-irsa-policy"
ebs_csi_irsa_policy_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:policy/zilliz/zilliz-ebs-csi-irsa-policy"
management_role_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/zilliz/zilliz-management-role"
permission_boundary_policy_arn = "arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:policy/zilliz/zilliz-permission-boundary-policy"
With your ARNs in hand, proceed to activate your cloud region in the Zilliz Cloud console.
: Select a subnet mask for BYOC deployment under your preferred VPC. Zilliz will create a new VPC under your
account for BYOC deployment. We recommend you select a suitable network segment based on the size of the BYOC cluster and long-term business plans.
Allow about 30 minutes for the activation process to complete. You can review the resources created under your
account. For a list of necessary resources, refer to
Once complete, your cloud region will become active, and you can start
